# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to ensuring the security of `vue2-lsp-pathfinder.nvim`. Security patches will be applied to the latest release.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

The `vue2-lsp-pathfinder.nvim` team and community take all security vulnerabilities seriously. Thank you for your efforts to responsibly disclose your findings.

To report a security vulnerability, please use the **"Report a vulnerability"** button on the [Security tab](https://github.com/matiyas/vue2-lsp-pathfinder.nvim/security).

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

You should receive a response within 48 hours. If for some reason you do not, please follow up to ensure we received your original report.

We will work with you to understand and resolve the issue. Once the vulnerability is resolved, we will release a patch and publicly credit you for the discovery, if you wish.
